ğŸš€ This week, several new items have been introduced, letting you fly routes using the A310 with the Pan Am livery or the A320 with the Spirit livery. If you're looking for something larger, there's a package that lets you fly a 747 with a Japan Airlines livery. Additionally, there's a new package in the Above the Sky series from Perfect Flight, offering the chance to explore South America or enhance your Citation landing skills with the advanced challenges package.
